channel.title: Comments on: My Path to the Dark Side part 1 – The Beginning
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.content:encoded:
I don’t know that the recipes would make much sense to anyone. I eventually want to add a “reporting” function to print the recipes and display in a more readable format, if I decide to blog about that I suppose I’d have to use a whole recipe.

Part 2 will be done soon, my problem is I work much faster then I write so I’m ahead of myself now, and need to work backwards some.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Nice, can’t wait for part 2

Will you post any recipes?
